articles.description: Since listing, the stock fell 18.6% over four days, after being listed at Rs 262 apiece on the NSE.
articles.content:
Jio Financial Services Ltd. saw retail investors increase their shareholding by 6.48%, even as the stock dropped nearly 20% since listing.
According to the shareholding pattern on BSE, institutional… [+451 chars]

articles.title: Gold, silver price today, October 25, 2023: Precious metals witness dip on MCX - India Today
articles.description: Gold Price Today 25 October 2023: Both gold and silver are trading on the lower side of the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Wednesday. Check the latest city-wise prices here.
articles.content:
Both gold and silver prices recorded a dip on the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Wednesday, October 25, 2023.
Gold futures, maturing on December 5, 2023, stood at Rs 60,568 per 10 grams on the MC… [+1959 chars]

articles.description: BlackRock's (BLK.N) proposed bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) was added to a clearing-house eligibility file in August, but the move is not indicative of any regulatory approval, …
